title: Faramir's Company (18C49)
text:
Set:	Treachery & Deceit
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Follower
Game Text:	Aid - Add a threat. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a threat to transfer this to a companion.) When you attach this card to a companion, spot a [Gondor] possession to heal that companion.
Rarity:	C
